alert.note: Alert for Goshen (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:57PM MDT until June 20 at 1:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN GOSHEN COUNTY... At 1257 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yoder, or 16 miles southwest of Torrington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yoder, Huntley, Veteran and Hawk Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
